name.description: Specifies the name of the EventGrid Event Subscription resource. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

scope.description: Specifies the scope at which the EventGrid Event Subscription should be created. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

event_delivery_schema.description: Specifies the event delivery schema for the event subscription. Possible values include: `EventGridSchema`, `CloudEventV01Schema`, `CustomInputSchema`.

topic_name.description: Specifies the name of the topic to associate with the event subscription.

included_event_types.description: A list of applicable event types that need to be part of the event subscription.

labels.description: A list of labels to assign to the event subscription.

storage_account_id.description: Specifies the id of the storage account id where the storage blob is located.

queue_name.description: Specifies the name of the storage queue where the Event Subscriptio will receive events.

eventhub_id.description: Specifies the id of the eventhub where the Event Subscription will receive events.

hybrid_connection_id.description: Specifies the id of the hybrid connection where the Event Subscription will receive events.

url.description: Specifies the url of the webhook where the Event Subscription will receive events.

subject_begins_with.description: A string to filter events for an event subscription based on a resource path prefix.

subject_ends_with.description: A string to filter events for an event subscription based on a resource path suffix.

case_sensitive.description: Specifies if `subject_begins_with` and `subject_ends_with` case sensitive. This value defaults to `false`.

storage_blob_container_name.description: Specifies the name of the Storage blob container that is the destination of the deadletter events

max_delivery_attempts.description: Specifies the maximum number of delivery retry attempts for events.

event_time_to_live.description: Specifies the time to live (in minutes

id.description: The ID of the EventGrid Event Subscription.

create.description: Used when creating the EventGrid Event Subscription.

update.description: Used when updating the EventGrid Event Subscription.

read.description: Used when retrieving the EventGrid Event Subscription.

delete.description: Used when deleting the EventGrid Event Subscription.
